item.title: Frankie Muniz Teases ‘Malcolm in the Middle’ Reboot: “People Will Be Surprised”
item.description: The actor returns as the titular character in the Disney+ revival, which also stars Bryan Cranston and Jane Kaczmarek.

item.title: ‘Malcolm in the Middle’ Star Frankie Muniz Says Fans Will Be ‘Surprised’ to See ‘Where Everybody Is’ in Series Reboot: ‘Hard to Fit 20 Years of Stuff into Four 30-Minute Episodes’
